BQLive











Japanese shares rose while the yen declined on speculation Japan’s prime minister will press for a stimulus package alongside his expected call for a snap election.The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of NSE Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, rose 0.10 percent to 9,993 as of 6:45 a.m.Here’s a quick look at all that could influence equities on Monday.
title: All You Need To Know Going Into Trade On September 25
